HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Check out the new options panel (Options > Mod Settings), where you can customize the beds' color scheme to your liking!|Also, notice the beddings' category has been changed to Apparel, for compatibility purposes.|The full change log is on our Steam Workshop page.

Your beds have just been improved!|- The code for the bed insulation properties has been revised to overcome a RimWorld quirk. Now it will also affect your pawn's "Slept in Cold/Heat" thoughts, just like it was supposed to.|- You can now copy & paste beddings settings from one bed to another.|- Hospitality is no longer required!|- Improved performance & compatibility with other mods.|You can find the full change log on our Steam Workshop page.|(NOTE: Due to the changes, loading a saved game for the first time with the development mode activated might produce some red errors on the log window. They are harmless, please just ignore them.)

A new feature was added to the mod settings! |img:MiyuriMode|caption:You can now choose to have your beds manually unmade by a colonist, instead of the bedding just popping out when you command it to unmake. It works just like other game objects with and on/off switch. To activate this, open the mod settings panel (Options > Mod Settings) and select Require a colonist to unmake beds. |Other improvements on this version: |- The rest effectiveness for the Animal Bed was adjusted so it doesn't get too powerful once the textile softness bonus is applied. |- The report window for a sleeping pawn takes the bed into account for the min/max comfortable temperature calculation once again (it was missing on RW 1.1). | |img:Quarantine|caption:The new settings feature was a request by one of our earliest supporters on our Ko-fi page. However small, the fact he decided to turn his appreciation into a material contribution meant a lot to me back then. Having this level of support is what fuels mod development! Now, because of the COVID-19 lockdown, those contributions became even more important. So I've put up this one-time campaign as an incentive for those who are able to help me get through this period. |I have three brand new mods that are ready to go, and I'll release them as donations reach their goals. If only a fraction of Soft Warm Beds subscribers decide to take action, these mods will be out before we know it! |Follow the link above or go to https://ko-fi.com/jptrrs to contribute & check more details. |You can contact me anytime, on Ko-Fi or on Steam. Many, many thanks for your support!
